eUKhost's Cloud hosting service comes in two variants namely VMware Cloud and HyperV Cloud. This offers users a choice that best suits their hosting requirements. Both these clusters are setup using Dell R610 Dual Quad and Hexa Core Processor servers, with 96 GB RAM in each. Each server is configured in RAID and is dual powered from two separate power feeds. We use redundant 10 Gbit Arista switches for our internal network and EMC Isilon for the remote storage. The cluster is set-up in a TIER IV facility that allows us to prevent the possibility of downtime that may be caused due to power or network outage.

Cloud Hosting features:-

* Complete Operating System isolation.
* Guaranteed Resources like CPU, RAM and storage space for your usage.
* Full Administrative level access via SSH/Remote Desktop.
* Private IP Addresses
